workflow.description: This workflow illustrates how to have one workflow schedule another workflow.

param.name: whenToRun
param.description: When to run the Hello World workflow

attrib.name: scheduledTask
attrib.description: A vRO Task object (not a VC:Task) so that we can keep track of the scheduled workflow

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.description: Schedule a workflow and create a task.
